text: Mark Brantley (born 11 January 1969) is a Saint Kitts and Nevis lawyer and politician. He is the Premier of Nevis since 2017 and the Minister of Foreign Affairs for St Kitts and Nevis since 2015. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Premiers of Nevis Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Mark Brantley
